title: Riot, high definition assets, please.
body:
In a perfect world we would have all the items, champion, skins, abilities, speel, elo emblems, masteries emblems, chests, capsules, well, everything, in high definition files, so the content creators(websites, fan art, youtube), could do their thing, but...

Can we at least have the elo, masteries and hextech stuff in high def?

1920x1080 would be great

But i believe everything you release is 1280x720. That works.
No background, if possible(.png)

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
What do you mean by 1920x1080? This is not a texture resolution, it is a screen resolution.

Almost all the champion textures are 512p or 1024p depending on need, which is standard for games, some unusually big things have 2048p.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=RE6MiqwB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-11-24T04:27:56.795+0000)
>
> What do you mean by 1920x1080? This is not a texture resolution, it is a screen resolution.
> 
> Almost all the champion textures are 512p or 1024p depending on need, which is standard for games, some unusually big things have 2048p.

If you dont know, this not for you.
IE, you dont know and are going to cover it up by insulting me. Pathetic.
